resources.string: Results-driven Senior Android Developer with over 7 years of experience, extensive expertise in programming languages such as Kotlin, Java, and C++, and a strong background in development using Jetpack, Compose, and various APIs. Demonstrated leadership in spearheading the design and development of innovative applications, including a Bluetooth communication management app and a Wearable app for blood-analyte sensors. Proven ability to work independently and collaboratively, driving projects from conception to successful implementation. Adept at optimizing performance, integrating cutting-edge features, and ensuring consistency across platforms. Holds a Certified Scrum Master certification and has a track record of successful remote work as a digital nomad. Previous experience includes impactful roles at Abbott, CVS Health, Charles Schwab, and Microsoft, contributing significantly to major app features, redesigns, and the transition to remote work arrangements. Holds a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from Florida State University.
